entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the morning then rising. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
